lines.text: Doctor, you were third in your class. I never went to college. I knew he was having a fit when he started having it.
[news of a brutal murder spreads rapidly, and causes a large number of men to gather at the scene]
Only Preacher Biggers. I called him after I called you.
Well, I figured somebody oughta tell her brother what happened to her. Preacher Biggers' the only one in Frenchtown that's got a telephone.
Well, we're lucky you ain't got a pocketful of dimes, aren't we?
